name: It's Raining Saws, Stay Alive!
description:
It was a seemingly normal Wednesday morning.

Jorge was late for work and left in a hurry without looking

The weather forecast, which he did every morning.

Jorge found out the hard way that it was raining... Sierras!

Dodge the mountains, keep Jorge alive and collect as many coins as you can.

Recommendations; Resolution - Play in full HD (1920 x 1080). Operating System - Windows. Controls: Use A and D or left and right arrow keys to dodge the saws and collect coins. ESC to pause and unpause the game.
